name: Spaceballs
notes: This is my friend's favorite movie he recommended, like a spoof of Star Wars.

name: Eternals
notes: New Marvel movie that came out recently that my friend said was pretty good, introduces a new team of superheroes that look like Humans but have existed far longer.

name: Full Metal Alchemist Brotherhood
notes: This is my friend's favorite anime he recommended. Heavy on the action with a bit of humor mixed in; more dark than humorous. Some of the stuff they can do is like magic, but it's really more of a science.
